Not a Smartlook user yet?: Smartlook code assigned to your account.
"Ještě nejste uživatelem Smartlook?": Smartlook kód přiřazen k vašemu účtu.

Not a Smartlook user yet?: Show info about your customers (name, email, etc.) in Smartlook dashboard, where your agents can see it. You will find customer info in the right panel while recording.
